short_summary: Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to provide aggregate materials for construction at two pits in Banff and Jasper national parks
description: Parks Canada requires a contractor to crush abrasives for winter maintenance in Banff and Jasper National Parks. Work is to take place at Mannix Pit just west of Castle Junction on the Trans-Canada Highway in Banff National Park, where 24,000m3 will be crushed. Work will also take place at Marmot Pit on Highway 93N, 7km south of Highway 16 in Jasper National Park where 13,000m3 will be crushed. Marmot Pit first requires stripping of organics and overburden soil before crushing.

**Stage 2 Tender Notice**
### Marmot & Mannix Pit Aggregate Crushing, Banff National Park & Jasper National Park

#### Solicitation Number
*5P468-24-0021/A-001*

#### Amendment Number
*1*

#### Publication Date
*06/05/2024*

#### Tender Closing Date
*06/19/2024, 16:00:00*

#### Amendment Date
*06/19/2024*

#### Notice Type
*Request for Proposal (RFP)*

#### Tender Description
Parks Canada requests the crushing of abrasives for winter maintenance in Banff and Jasper National Parks. The project involves the crushing of approximately 24,000 m3 at Mannix Pit, located west of Castle Junction on the Trans-Canada Highway in Banff National Park, and 13,000 m3 at Marmot Pit, located on Highway 93N, 7 km south of Highway 16 in Jasper National Park.

#### Partner with Indigenous Business
Parks Canada invites Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender opportunity. Interested suppliers are encouraged to establish partnerships with Indigenous businesses in line with the procurement's Indigenous Business Development Strategy.

#### Two-Stage Selection Process
This tender notice is the second stage of a two-stage selection process. The first stage evaluated the qualifications of all interested suppliers. Stage 2 invites qualified suppliers to submit further details and a financial bid on the project, based on the specifications and drawings provided.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Suppliers will be evaluated on their firm guarantee to engage Indigenous sub-contractors for services or to procure materials and equipment from Indigenous suppliers.

#### Important Dates
*Expected Contract Start Date: 06/21/2024*
*Expected Contract End Date: 09/16/2024*
